message.raw:
Fixed bug of RunviewerClass of NovaTechDDS9M whereby dummy first instruction in
asynchronous update_mode was not being discarded, and thus plotted traces in
runviewer were all one update behind, and missing the final update.
message.html:
Fixed bug of RunviewerClass of NovaTechDDS9M whereby dummy first instruction in
asynchronous update_mode was not being discarded, and thus plotted traces in
runviewer were all one update behind, and missing the final update.

message:
Fixed bug of RunviewerClass of NovaTechDDS9M whereby dummy first instruction in
